div.p:
Climate and plant functional traits both influence landâ€“atmosphere feedbacks and affect drought intensification. Groupings show the feedbacks between soil moisture (SM) and Temp, VPD or SH. ( A) Variance explained by the full model (white), variance jointly explained by climate and traits in variance decomposition (tan), explained by climate alone (yellow) and by traits alone (green). ( B) Standardized variable coefficients across all models for MAT and community-weighted traits of: Amax.m, P50.sd, Amax.sd, and PsiM.m. See
SI Appendix, Table S2 for trait names.
